pull.title: ci: Enable feature_asmap.py test on native Windows
pull.body: This PR is a [follow up](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23084#issuecomment-927077970) of #23084. It enables the `feature_asmap.py` functional test which is fixed in #23084.

events.body:
>  It enables the feature_asmap.py functional test which is fixed now.

Fixed when, with what change? Probably easier to just mention this in #23102.

> Fixed when, with what change?

In #23084.

> Probably easier to just mention this in #23102.

Agree. @MarcoFalke ?

Rebased on top of the merged #23102.

> Probably easier to just mention this in #23102.

Is no longer relevant.
